duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain and repair Township owned buildings, facilities, grounds, parks, open spaces, recreational structures, roads, bridges, and rights-of-way.
Operate Township owned vehicles and equipment such as dump trucks, backhoes, snowplows, salt spreaders, power tools, chainsaws, and air compressors.
Perform semi-skilled and skilled maintenance tasks related to construction, maintenance, and trade experience.
Follow written and oral instructions, and work independently or as part of a team.
Maintain a good working relationship with co-workers and the public.
Perform strenuous work in various weather conditions, storm events, late-hour emergencies, and snow/ice removal operations.
Be available for call outs for evenings, weekends, and holidays.
Utilize trade skills in electrical, HVAC, carpentry, plumbing, etc., if possessed.
Pass a background examination and drug test.

education_certification.credential: High school or trade school diploma or equivalent. Valid Pennsylvania Driver’s license. Ability to obtain and maintain a Class 'A' Commercial Driver’s license.
